title: Archaic emblem (discontinued)

Originally, the Tier 1 and 10 Mysterious emblems received were tradeable and could be turned into banknotes. In 2019, Bounty Hunter was reworked; the Mysterious emblems were converted into Archaic emblems and made untradeable. content:
Archaic emblem (discontinued) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
This article is about the former banknote. For the item which has been discontinued on the main server but still obtainable on Deadman Worlds, see Archaic emblem.

The Archaic emblems are former discontinued items that could be obtained as a reward from Bounty Hunter. Originally, the Tier 1 and 10 Mysterious emblems received were tradeable and could be turned into banknotes. In 2019, Bounty Hunter was reworked; the Mysterious emblems were converted into Archaic emblems and made untradeable. Any player who had one in banknote form was given this unique discontinued variant; it was identical to the real Archaic emblems, except stackable.

In 2021, all Archaic emblems were removed from the game with the closure of the Bounty Hunter Reward Shop. While the normal versions can still be obtained during Deadman Mode, the stackable variants are now gone entirely.

The '''Archaic emblems''' are former discontinued items that could be obtained as a reward from [[Bounty Hunter]]. Originally, the Tier 1 and 10 [[Mysterious emblem (historical)|Mysterious emblems]] received were tradeable and could be turned into banknotes. In 2019, Bounty Hunter was reworked; the Mysterious emblems were converted into [[Archaic emblem]]s and made untradeable. Any player who had one in banknote form was given this unique discontinued variant; it was identical to the real Archaic emblems, except stackable.

In 2021, all Archaic emblems were removed from the game with the closure of the Bounty Hunter Reward Shop. While the normal versions can still be obtained during Deadman Mode, the stackable variants are now gone entirely.

{{Bounty Hunter}}
